attributes.action: a vote of no confidence in either the Tories nor the Labour party
attributes.additional_details: Cameron should resign immediately not in the Autumn along with Osbourne both opposed Brexit and did their fair share of promoting fear. Corbyn also should go.New leaders should be decided and a general election held
attributes.background: since Thursday's referendum to Brexit the EU neither the Tories nor Labour are showing any solidarity all are in house fighting, therefore we the public call for a vote of no confidence in our government. We cannot go forward until we are all singing from the same sheet the majority voted to leave!

rejection.details: This petition is about political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
